Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the manufacturing of portable electronic devices
Summary: Requires portable electronic devices manufactured for sale in the state to be equipped with an ATSC 3.0 chip.
LawCode: Add Art 40-A ยง925, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the manufacturing of portable electronic devices
